basics.name: MohammadReza Vazifeh
basics.label: Senior Full-Stack .NET Developer | Architecting Scalable Solutions with Blazor, MAUI & Microservices
basics.summary: Innovative **Senior Full-Stack Architect & .NET Expert** with **over a decade of experience** in building high-performance, scalable solutions. Specializing in the modern .NET ecosystem **(my.NET 9/10, MAUI, Blazor)**, I bridge the gap between complex backend architecture and engaging frontend experiences. A **polyglot developer (C#, Python, Kotlin) and AI-adopter** who leverages cutting-edge tools to accelerate delivery. Proven track record in engineering robust **Microservices**, developing **algorithmic trading bots**, and integrating **Blockchain technology**. I turn abstract business concepts into deployed, **production-ready reality.**

work.name: Ertebatat Pazhoohan Matin
work.summary: * **Architected and maintained enterprise-grade** platforms for School Service Management across major cities (Shiraz, Isfahan, Qazvin), utilizing **C#** and **Onion Architecture **to ensure high scalability and maintainability. * Developed "Safir Mehr," a **native Android application using Kotlin**, providing a seamless mobile experience for fleet management and user interaction. * **Engineered "Automatic license plate recognition" an AI-powered system** using **Python**, integrating intelligent processing capabilities (**AI/Computer Vision**) into the company's product ecosystem. * **Accelerated product development cycles** by pioneering the use of AI-native IDEs (like Cursor), significantly boosting coding velocity and efficiency. * **Delivered multiple functional MVPs within one-week sprints**, leveraging bleeding-edge technologies such as **.NET 10** and **PostgreSQL **to rapidly validate business concepts.

work.name: BahamShop (Product Search Engine Startup)
work.summary: * Spearheaded the end-to-end development of "BahamShop," leading a cross-functional team to deliver a next-gen search engine ahead of schedule. * **Designed an Automated SEO & Content Workflow using n8n**, **reducing manual data entry by 100% and significantly improving product indexing speed on search engines**. * Orchestrated the aggregation of product data from multiple sources, creating a centralized database that allows users to compare prices across the entire Iranian market instantly. * Architected a high-performance** Product Search Engine utilizing ASP.NET Core 9 and Clean Architecture**, ensuring sub-millisecond response times for complex queries. * Developed a unified cross-platform experience using **.NET MAUI and Blazor Hybrid**, sharing 90% of the codebase between Web, Android, and iOS to accelerate time-to-market. * Implemented **CQRS **and **RabbitMQ **to decouple data ingestion from search query processing, improving system scalability and fault tolerance.

work.name: ParsiaAfzar FaraAndishanNovin
work.summary: * Spearheaded the architecture and development of a dynamic Workflow Engine (BPMS), transitioning from a monolithic structure to a scalable **Microservices architecture** using **RabbitMQ**, **CQRS**, and **Domain-Driven Design (DDD)**. * Led a cross-functional development team, conducting code reviews and mentoring junior developers to ensure high code quality and successful integration of the **Vue.js** frontend with the .NET Core backend. * **Delivered mission-critical software solutions for electricity distribution companies across multiple cities**, ensuring high availability and optimizing data processing workflows. * Engineered a custom Content Management System (**CMS**) using **ASP.NET Core MVC**, significantly improving the company's web presence and content administration capabilities.

work.position: Freelance Full-Stack Developer & Emerging Tech Enthusiast
work.name: Independent Consultant
work.summary: * **Engineered algorithmic trading systems** using **MQL4/MQL5** and C#, successfully converting complex manual trading strategies into automated bots (**EAs**) with back-testing and risk management modules. * **Architected cross-platform mobile solutions** using **.NET MAUI and Blazor Hybrid**, creating a unified codebase for Web, Android, and iOS to maximize development efficiency. * **Prototyped decentralized applications** (**dApps**) by integrating** Smart Contracts** with .NET applications, leveraging blockchain technology for secure and transparent data handling. * **Developed advanced automation workflows** using **n8n **and** AI Agents**, enabling seamless integration between different SaaS platforms and reducing manual operational overhead. * **Delivered freelance consultancy** for diverse clients, translating niche business requirements into robust software solutions while maintaining a continuous cycle of upskilling in bleeding-edge technologies.

work.name: ParsiaAfzar FaraAndishanNovin
work.summary: * Spearheaded the architecture and development of a dynamic Workflow Engine (BPMS), transitioning from a monolithic structure to a scalable **Microservices architecture** using **RabbitMQ**, **CQRS**, and **Domain-Driven Design (DDD)**. * Led a cross-functional development team, conducting code reviews and mentoring junior developers to ensure high code quality and successful integration of the **Vue.js** frontend with the .NET Core backend. * **Delivered mission-critical software solutions for electricity distribution companies across multiple cities**, ensuring high availability and optimizing data processing workflows. * Engineered a custom Content Management System (**CMS**) using **ASP.NET Core MVC**, significantly improving the company's web presence and content administration capabilities.

work.name: Rasta International Finance
work.summary: * **Established modern DevOps practices** by introducing **Git** and **Azure DevOps**, transitioning the organization from legacy workflows to **Agile/Scrum methodologies**, which significantly improved team collaboration and release cycles. * **Managed the end-to-end delivery** of a financial **CRM** and a network-based investment platform, translating complex business requirements into technical roadmaps. * Architected and deployed a **RESTful API** for a high-traffic **PWA** reservation system, ensuring seamless data synchronization and integration with the Angular frontend. * **Oversaw the frontend development strategy**, facilitating the adoption of **Angular frameworks** to enhance user experience and modernize the application's user interface.

work.name: Nikan Exir Vista Rayan
work.summary: * **Developed and maintained RESTful APIs** using **ASP.NET Core**, serving as the backend backbone for a beauty salon reservation and appointment management system. * **Collaborated closely with the frontend team** to integrate the Progressive Web Application (PWA) with backend services, ensuring efficient data transmission. * **Designed and implemented database schemas** using **SQL Server** and **Entity Framework**, optimizing data storage for user appointments and schedules.

certificates.name: Certificate of Completion: Professional ASP.NET Core & MVC
Web Development with PHP & CodeIgniter Framework

skills.name: Programming Languages: C#, Python, JavaScript, SQL, HTML, CSS, MQL4/MQL5
.NET Ecosystem & Frameworks: .NET 8/9, ASP.NET Core, Blazor (WASM/Server), .NET MAUI, Entity Framework Core, SignalR, LINQ
Frontend & UI Libraries: Vue.js, React.js, Angular, Bootstrap, MudBlazor, DevExpress, Telerik, Syncfusion
Databases: Microsoft SQL Server, PostgreSQL, MySQL, SQLite, Redis
Architecture & Concepts: Microservices, Clean Architecture, Domain-Driven Design (DDD), CQRS, SOLID Principles, Design Patterns, RESTful APIs, OpenAPI/Swagger
DevOps, Cloud & Tools: Docker, Kubernetes, Git, Azure DevOps, CI/CD Pipelines, RabbitMQ, Visual Studio
Emerging Tech & Automation: Blockchain Development, Smart Contracts, AI/ML Integration (Python), Algorithmic Trading, n8n (Workflow Automation)
